reviews.title: Gud.
reviews.comment: Gud game bt smetimes it stops nd I hv to Force Close. Bt whnevr I play this game, I jst Love it!!
reviews.author: Karan Chouhan

reviews.title: Rip off ?
reviews.comment: Paid for the full game been playing for a long time . Now it shows my rank stats name etc but now its asking again to pay again, ads pop up again etc etc what the heck ?
reviews.author: Harry Mueller

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Good game perfect doesn\'t mess up
reviews.author: Steven Hernandez

reviews.title: Worst Game
reviews.comment: Every time I go into this app it says \"Homerun Battle_Demo is not responding\". I use to have this game and it worked perfectly fine. I think it was just the update that made it worse.
reviews.author: Vraj Patel

reviews.title: Not fair
reviews.comment: Lost all my gold gear and upgrades with the update, downloaded a partner apps to get free gold and didn\'t get it! Now uninstall...

reviews.comment: Ok i am happy 2 play this game......some sence like a 3d effect....so overall its good....

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: Easy n enjoyable game.  Great effect n good voice.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: The matchup mode is awesome!! Overall, a wonderful game! Addicted!

reviews.title: Eh
reviews.comment: Forces close the second version you must have an internet connection in order to play it..wish you guys would state that.otherwise it\'s one of the better homerun games here on android os

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: Love this game. It\'s addictive af. Lol download it! Only problem is that it has a hard time picking up wifi or 3G. Sometimes says weak connection or shows a one bar during match ups and lose win points. :/ help???

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Android users can\'t get upgrades with paid version, only I phone users can . What gives? 5 stars when that\'s fixed

reviews.comment: I love ths game-its so adictive..pleasu put up more missions..

reviews.comment: I\'m impressed by com2us homerun,  but what is need that running in the game when we hit a homerun type shot.

reviews.title: Great addictive game!
reviews.comment: Fun to try and get ranked up and play your friends!
